title: 2018 Pumpkin Contest Winners
description: The winners of this year's pumpkin-carving contest have been chosen -- and they're monstrously spectacular. We'd like to thank everyone who participated this year, and we can't wait to see your mad scientist skills in action again next time around. Check out all of the creepy, incredible, and creative winning pumpkins here.

title: Heroic Deals: October 30 – November 6, 2018
description: Check out the Hero sales and featured items listed here, and then head in-game to add them to your collection before this offer expires on November 6.

title: Heroes of the Storm Hotfix Patch Notes – October 26, 2018
description: We’ve just released a Heroes of the Storm patch in order to address a few live bugs. Read on for details.

title: Heroes Brawl of the Week, October 26, 2018: Hallow’s End
description: Trick your enemies and treat your friends, the time has come for Hallow’s End!

title: Twitch Drops Are Back for Heroes and StarCraft II
description: Watch the HGC Finals or the WCS Global Finals at BlizzCon Opening Week and BlizzCon to earn in-game loot!

title: Heroic Deals: October 23 – October 30, 2018
description: Check out the Hero sales and featured items listed here, and then head in-game to add them to your collection before this offer expires on October 30.

title: Heroes Brawl of the Week, October 19, 2018: Blackheart’s Revenge
description: Hoist your mainsails, load your cannons, and prepare the gangplank, Heroes. Blackheart’s Revenge is coming back to the Nexus!

title: Heroes of the Storm Patch Notes – October 16, 2018
description: Our newest patch, featuring Mal’Ganis, is now live! Read on for a detailed breakdown of what’s new in the Nexus.

title: Heroic Deals: October 16 – October 23, 2018
description: Our latest round of Heroic Deals offers 50% off select Heroes, and brings a fresh set of skins and mounts into the featured item rotation.

title: 2018 Halloween Pumpkin Carving Contest
description: The Halloween season has finally arrived, and we’re ready to cut straight to the heart of the holiday.

title: Heroes Brawl of the Week, October 12, 2018: Industrial District
description: This week’s Heroes Brawl is an Overwatch-inspired single-lane slugfest: Industrial District!

title: Heroic Deals: October 9 – October 16, 2018
description: Our latest round of Heroic Deals offers 50% off select Heroes, and brings a fresh set of skins and mounts into the featured item rotation.

title: Heroes of the Storm PTR Patch Notes – October 8, 2018
description: Our next Heroes of the Storm patch has just hit the Public Test Realm and will be available for playtesting until October 15.

title: Heroes of the Storm Balance Patch Notes - October 10, 2018
description: We're about to release a new Heroes of the Storm patch to apply a number of balance changes and bug fixes.

title: Heroes Brawl of the Week, October 5, 2018: Punisher Arena
description: A no-holds-barred battle between Heroes and Punishers. Be the first team to win two rounds and claim victory!

title: Heroic Deals: October 2 – October 9, 2018
description: Our latest round of Heroic Deals offers 50% off select Heroes, and brings a fresh set of skins and mounts into the featured item rotation.

title: Get the BlizzCon 2018 Goody Bag!
description: Score a hoard of Blizzard loot to commemorate this year’s epic show, while supplies last.

title: Heroes Brawl of the Week, September 28, 2018: Lost Cavern
description: This week's Heroes Brawl is Lost Cavern!

description: Our newest patch is now live! Read on for details on what’s been added or changed.

title: Heroes Brawl of the Week, September 21, 2018: Booty Coffers
description: Ol’ Blackheart’s got a gift for ya - This week's Heroes Brawl is Booty Coffers!

title: 2018 Ranked Season 4 Dates and Rewards
description: Heroes of the Storm’s third 2018 ranked season is coming to a close! Read on for a preview of the 2018 Season 4 rewards, changes, and dates!
